titles.title: Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael / Mälkǝʾa Mikaʾel "Image of Michael"

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dǝrsanä Mikaʾel, Homiliary for the feasts of St. Michael (fols. 1ra-46rb) I-1) Homily by Timothy (Dumatewos), Patriarch of Alexandria for the 12th of Ḫǝdar (fols. 1ra-7ra); miracle (fols. 7ra-8va); commemorative notice (fols. 8va-9ra); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 9ra) I-2) Homily by an anonymous author for Taḫśaś (fols. 9rb-11vb, 40ra-41vb); miracle (fols. 12ra-rb, 13ra-vb, 41vb); commemorative notice (fol. 12rb-vb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 12vb) I-3) Homily [by Epiphanius, Metropolitan of Cyprus] for Ṭǝrr (fols. 12vb, 14ra-15vb, 17ra-18vb, 19ra, 32ra-35vb); miracle (fols. 16ra-rb,19ra-vb); commemorative notice (fol. 16rb-va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 16va-vb) I-4) Homily by "one of the ancient saints, the Orthodox" [anonymous author] for the 12th of Yäkkatit (fols. 16vb, 20ra-26rb); miracle (fols. 26rb-27rb); commemorative notice (fol. 27rb-va); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 27va-vb) I-5) Homily by Yoḥannǝs, Metropolitan of ʾAksum for Säne (fols. 27vb, 28ra-31vb, 36ra-37vb, 38ra); miracle (fol. 38ra-vb); commemorative notice (fols. 38vb-39vb, 42ra); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 42ra) I-6) Homily by the 24 Heavenly Priests [anonymous author] [for Näḥase] (fols. 42ra-45rb); miracle (fols. 45rb-46ra); commemorative notice (fol. 46rb); ʾarke-hymn (fol. 46rb) II) Mälkǝʿa Mikaʾel “Image of Michael” (fols. 47va-52ra)
Additiones 1-2.

originlink.xlink:title: Mäḵodʿä Däbrä Gännät Kidanä Mǝḥrät / GKM

locationlink.xlink:title: Mäḵodʿä Däbrä Gännät Kidanä Mǝḥrät / GKM

copyists.copyist: Gäbrä ʾƎgziʾabǝḥer is mentioned as the scribe on fols. 38ra, 46va, 52ra. The same scribe produced Ms. DMA-010.

donors.donor: Wälättä Maryam is mentioned as the commissioner (ʾaṣḥafiha) on fol. 38ra. Furthermore her name and the names of her father Gäbrä Solomon, her mother Wälättä Giyorgis and her sister Wälättä Mikaʾel are written in supplication formulas. In addition, several other persons are mentioned: Wälättä Yoḥannǝs (fol. 9rb), Ḫirutä Śǝllase (fol. 12vb), Wäldä ʾƎsṭifanos (fols. 12rb, 38ra), Wälättä Tǝnśaʾe (fol. 13ra), Gäbrä Maryam (fol. 16rb), Wäldä Maryam (fols. 16rb, 19ra), Ḫaylä Maryam (fol. 19ra-rb), Ḫarägä Wäyn (fol. 19rb), Täwäldä Mädḫǝn (fols. 38ra, 41vb), ʾabunä Ḫaylä Maryam (fol. 42ra).

txstates.txstate: The Ms. is worn. Both boards are broken and crudely repaired; they have probably been re-used. The sewing is damaged and has been crudely repaired with different threads. Many fols. are misplaced. Fol. 16 is damaged with the loss of text.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards (both broken and repaired). Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes and tears are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

squires.squire:
I(8/fols. 1r-8v) – II(7; s.l.: 4, stub after 3/fols. 9r-15v) – III(4/fols. 16r-19v) – IV(8/fols. 20r-27v) – V(4/fols. 28r-31v) – VI(4/fols. 32r-35v) – VII(4/fols. 36r-39v) – VIII(2/fols. 40r-41v) – IX(9; s.l.: 3, stub after 5/fols. 42r-50v) – X(2/fols. 51r-52v)
The quire structure cannot be determined with certainty, as many leaves are misplaced and have been crudely sewn together. One bifolio (fols. 47-48) is an eccentric insertion into quire XI, between leaves 6 and 7 (fols. 46 and 49).

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; name of the protagonist; name of the commissioner and of her family members; groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I; incipits of all sections of Text I and incipit of Text II; the word sälam "salutation" in Text II; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: Throughout Text II: ሰላ፡ for ሰላም፡ ሚ or ሚካ፡ for ሚካኤል፡

otherdetails.otherdetail: Many leaves are misplaced. The correct sequence would be: I-2) Homily: fols. 9rb-11vb, 40ra-41vb; miracle: fols. 41vb, 13ra-vb,12ra-rb I-3) Homily: fols. 12vb, 14ra-15vb, 17ra-18vb, 32ra-35vb, 19ra; miracle: fols. 19ra-vb, 16ra-rb I-4) Homily: fols. 16vb, 20ra-26rb I-5) Homily: fols. 27vb, 36ra-37vb, 28ra-31vb, 38ra; commemorative notice: fols. 38vb-39vb, 42ra.

additional.cont: Fol. 46vb: Record of guarantee for borrowing the book of Dərsanä Mikaˀel.
additional.det: The very recent note is crudely written in Tǝgrǝñña, in pen, and is followed by writing exercises. It states 1983 year of mercy (= 1990/91 A.D.) as the date of the conclusion of the contract.
The note is probably written in the main hand.

extras.extra: - Erased passage: fol. 25rb. - Omissions were inserted interlineally: fols. 29va, 49ra, 50va. - A short note mentioning Wälättä Maryam as the owner of the Ms. is written on fol. 52rb. - Minor notes and scribbles: fols. 1r-v, 2r, 20vb, 22v, 25r, 38r, 46vb, 47rb, 48r, 50r, 52r-v.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Monthly readings are indicated by the names of the months written in the upper margin and encircled by thin lines: ዘታኅሣሥ: fol. 9rb ዘጥር: fol. 12vb ዘሰኔ: fol. 27vb ዘነሐሴ: fol. 42ra.
